dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.message: This action removes ALL past playthroughs. Once reset, they can not be recovered.

newRecord.title: New record: {duration}
newRecord.message: You beat your previous record from {date} by {seconds}.

showHints.label: Show hints
showHints.tooltip: Show the hint or question for the item. Example: "What is the capital of Germany?".

allowPauses.label: Allow pauses
allowPauses.tooltip: Allow pausing the timer during the quiz. If allowed, choose between 1 to 5 or a infinite number of pauses.

requireWhitespaces.label: Require whitespaces
requireWhitespaces.tooltip: If enabled, requires you to type out all whitespaces. If disabled, whitespaces can be omitted, for example "BuenosAires" matches "Buenos Aires".

requireCapitalization.label: Require proper capitalization
requireCapitalization.tooltip: If enabled, requires you to use capital and lowercase letters. If disabled, capitalization is ignored, for example "berlin" matches "Berlin".

requireOrder.label: Require right ordering
requireOrder.tooltip: If enabled, requires you match the items in the same order as defined.
